dcterms:creator: Andrej Karpathy
Li Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for image captioning, containing images and their corresponding textual descriptions, widely used for training and evaluating image captioning models.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO

dcterms:description: An API provided by Google for translating text between languages, utilized in this work to generate Bengali captions from English sentences.
dcterms:title: Google Translation API
